ygData.subject: Re: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh lord, I ll keep an eye out for someone doing that and setup a macro button that just does:  /say Kenross is that you????? hehehe. ... Yeah, heh.  Mmmmm
ygData.messageBody:
> I would *never* hit on someone. When I play my females, I just giggle
> and bat my eyes a lot. Works like a charm. We men are such suckers...

Oh lord, I'll keep an eye out for someone doing that and setup
a macro button that just does: /say Kenross is that you?????

hehehe.

> I get this all the time when I'm at the bank. The other night I got a tell from a level four bard asking
> if I could help a poor fellow bard buy their level four song. Remembering how hard the first few levels
> were, I turned around to take a look. She was in full bronze! What, her twinker was too cheap to give
> her 50 plat? Of course, she was a wood elf, so I had to cough it up. (See sucker comment, above...)

Yeah, heh. Mmmmm woodelves in bronze, damn I would give in too.
Seeing that the song was only what? 8gp? hehe.

Harmonic.
